title: Tour de France: Jan Hirt Breaks Three Teeth in Pre-Stage Crash With Spectator
content:
Top teammate of Remco Evenepoel becomes tangled with spectator's backpack in pre-race paddock in disaster start to Tour de France.

Read the full article at Tour de France: Jan Hirt Breaks Three Teeth in Pre-Stage Crash With Spectator on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
